title: Color keying in art and living
brief_description: An analysis of color relationships. Considers the following: nature of light rays, the spectrum and primary colors; secondary colors and pigment primaries; light reflection by pigments; color keying; complimentary colors; the color wheel; how complimentary colors intensify one another; how color may be used to “echo” itself.
